+
+/*
+ * @test

+ * @requires os.maxMemory > 3G
+ * @requires vm.opt.MaxGCPauseMillis == "null"

+ *                              sun.hotspot.WhiteBox$WhiteBoxPermission
@@ -50,1 +61,13 @@

+ */
+
+/*
